channel.title: Hackits
channel.description:
Hackits are basically legal security challenges through which hacking and cracking skills can be learned and put to the test. Below is a list of good sites I've found, but there are a lot out there. I've posted this in Gen Programming considering the wide range of challenge topics.
http://www.hackthissite.org - The basic hacking challenges are good for beginners http://www.hackquest.com - Great variety of chellenges - good java challenges http://www.slyfx.com - Has an interesting variety of challenges - pretty easy for the most part http://arcanum.co.nz - Sort of an rpg challenge site http://www.hackits.de - Another good site, similar to HackQuest - more good java challenges http://aspect.bestweb.net - I didn't get very far http://3564020356.org - Very tough - you have to *deserve* entry http://www.mod-x.co.uk/main.php - Even tougher ;)
Enjoy :)

but how many people from this forum would do them

item.title: Hackits
item.dc:creator: @MrWicked MrWicked
item.description:
@MrWicked wrote:

Heh, Im reallly thinking of creating one myself now! after i finish drugscape, anyone be interested in creating applications where you must enter a password to get the answer?

Say a simple 1 would prompt a user for input.

Please enter password:
Password Incorrect!!

or 

Please enter password:
Password Correct '3dn3435'

Then as the levels progress the apps get hard to crack!

Ive created about 13 so. if anyone wants to create and submit some that be cool.

Read full topic

@BobDole81 wrote:

Hackits are basically legal security challenges through which hacking and cracking skills can be learned and put to the test. Below is a list of good sites I’ve found, but there are a lot out there. I’ve posted this in Gen Programming considering the wide range of challenge topics.

http://www.hackthissite.org - The basic hacking challenges are good for beginners
http://www.hackquest.com - Great variety of chellenges - good java challenges
http://www.slyfx.com - Has an interesting variety of challenges - pretty easy for the most part
http://arcanum.co.nz - Sort of an rpg challenge site
http://www.hackits.de - Another good site, similar to HackQuest - more good java challenges
http://aspect.bestweb.net - I didn’t get very far
http://3564020356.org - Very tough - you have to deserve entry
